title: Union Square, Somerville, includes all utilities
posting_body: Shimmy Everlasting, our fully vaccinated home near Union Square in Somerville, MA is looking for a likewise fully vaccinated housemate starting September 1st.
A lovely, mostly self-contained (except for shared laundry in a hallway) garden-level living space equivalent to a one-bedroom apartment: bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, two closets.
Efficient heating, off-street parking, back yard for summer dinners, private entrance.
Green line in easy walking distance.

Excellent household company of three adults containing the multitudes of musician, performing arts impresario, poet, digital learning and program management professionals, seriously good cooks, avid readers, extroverts, introverts; one Minecrafty, silly joke making, STEMy 10 year old; and one Minecrafty, silly joke making, ninja-in-training almost-6 year old.
LGBTQI-friendly; racial and social justice oriented.
The place combines the best aspects of living by yourself with the best parts of living with housemates.
$2000/mo + deposit, including all utilities, internet, and opt-in monthly cleaning.
If you're coming from a home with furry animals, we'll need to know and plan in advance.
If you are interested, please write us an email.
Tell us who you are, what you're about, what you're looking for in a living situation.
Tell us about your favorite things.
Describe other times you've lived with unrelated other people, and what you've thought of the experience(s).
We can meet virtually or in person as logistics allow, fully masked if the latter.
We look forward to hearing from you!
